# uni-combo-text



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                  | Type                             | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled`  | Marks this option as disabled                                                                                | `boolean`                        | `false`     |
| `selectOn` | `select-on` | When to fire the select event - focus: when the input is focused - change: when the input's value is changed | `"change" \| "focus" \| "input"` | `'focus'`   |
| `value`    | `value`     | Machine value for the option                                                                                 | `string`                         | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event       | Description                        | Type                |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `uniSelect` | Emitted when the button is clicked | `CustomEvent<void>` |
